Text.Language: Twbh m~Po#c# e~h~r/i e~jwn: w~ ]slet n~te P,#c#: ]a~gia Maria n~rem n~,/mi: n~tef,a nennobi nan e~bol.
Pray to the Lord on our behalf, O Bride of Christ, Saint Mary of Egypt, that He may forgive us our sins.
